**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 278 2.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- This staff is topped with carved animal and monster heads. While wielding the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Nature checks to identify animals. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells. Animal Staff **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 278 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 593 4.0 **Price** 90 gp ---
  • **Cantrip** [_know the way_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1582)
  • **1st** [_runic body_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1657), [_summon animal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1694)
Animal Staff (Greater) **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 278 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 593 4.0 **Price** 460 gp ---
  • **2nd** [_animal messenger_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1441), [_speak with animals_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1680), summon animal
  • **3rd** [_animal form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1440), summon animal
Animal Staff (Major) **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 278 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 593 4.0 **Price** 1,900 gp ---
  • **4th** summon animal
  • **5th** animal form, [_moon frenzy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1609), summon animal
name: Animal Staff (Major)
